Articles.Content:
Hello,

Been lurking for a little while, recently upgraded to 0.15. Finding that when I recreate designs that I made it to the Mun with before in 0.15 they are not even reaching stable orbits.

Having fun with space planes, but my designs tend to have limited performance envelopes. Push it outside that, and I have seen so many flat spins the janitors at KSC are threatening to strike.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome to the community Dorzak.

You\'ll have to experiment more with thrust and center of gravity, but that\'s all part of the fun

Good luck with your flights.
